entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
